'''1.2.1''' is a [[launcher]] version released on August 2, August 6, and August 7, 2013.

== Additions ==

* Added a warning about using [[Java Edition Beta|Beta]], [[Java Edition Alpha|Alpha]], and [[snapshot]] versions.
* Added Alpha versions.
* Five old versions from [[Java Edition Classic|Classic]] and [[Pre-classic]] have been added to the launcher.
